title: League Displays
body:
Hi, i downloaded the league displays app but when i try to open it, i just get a message saying:
League Displays is currently unable to access C:\...\AppData\Local which is required in order....

replies.body: Try and make sure you're running the display app with admin rights, but you may need to uninstall and reinstall it as admin to make sure it's working properly. Also that display app does need to be installed to the default drive, as well as League, to work the best.
I have tried everything, admin, other drive, reinstall, compatability and even start it through CMD.
